Question
========

In a two-way ANOVA with factors A and B, there is an interaction if

Answerlist
----------

* The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error.
* Both factor A and factor B have a significant main effect.
* The difference between the levels of factor A depends on the level of factor B.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The mean square for the interaction is approximately equal to the mean square of the error: Incorrect
* Both factor A and factor B have a significant main effect...: Incorrect
* The difference between the levels of factor A depends on the level of factor B.: Correct
